name: ANEGIS Consulting
description:
ANEGIS Consulting specialises in IT consultation for growing businesses. Using Microsoft Dynamics AX, we implement, redevelop and support projects for a wide range of companies.
Our expert knowledge allows us to work efficiently with our partners to implement and maintain software successfully, as well as complete implementations where the original plans have not yet been realised.
